lead_paragraph: Brian Fanelli, the former police chief of the town of Mount Pleasant, was sentenced to 18 months in prison for possession of child pornography.
snippet: Brian Fanelli, the former police chief of the town of Mount Pleasant, was sentenced to 18 months in prison for possession of child pornography.

headline.main: Ex-Police Chief in Westchester County Is Sentenced to Prison

abstract: Former Mount Pleasant, NY, Police Chief Brian Fanelli is sentenced to 18 months in prison for possession of child pornography.
